title.ja: AIと表現＋メディアの年表 0.1
title.en: Timeline of AI, Expression, and Media 0.1

description.ja: この年表はAIと表現＋メディア分野の主な製品や出来事を示します。
description.en: This timeline shows the major products and events in the xx field.

metadata.notes: Updates from contributors are welcome. Please do not create separate versions. When reusing data, credit the original authors.

1884.label: ライノタイプ（鋳植機の発明）
1884.note: Mechanized typesetting industrialized newspapers, changing deadlines, volume, and the economics of speed in modern journalism. #mediatec #journalism
1884.note_en: Mechanized typesetting industrialized newspapers, changing deadlines, volume, and the economics of speed in modern journalism. #メディア技術 #ジャーナリズム

1895.label: プレイヤーピアノ（ピアノラの普及期）
1895.note: Brought performance closer to recordable and editable data, a lineage that runs through MIDI, sampling, and generative music. #misictec #expressiontec
1895.note_en: Brought performance closer to recordable and editable data, a lineage that runs through MIDI, sampling, and generative music. #音楽技術 #表現技術

1919.label: バウハウス
1919.note: Integrated craft, design, and industrial technology, directly relevant to how tools shape expression, including today’s AI “workshop” framing. #expressiontec #design
1919.note_en: Integrated craft, design, and industrial technology, directly relevant to how tools shape expression, including today’s AI “workshop” framing. #表現技術 #デザイン

1927.label: オプチカルプリンタ（光学合成の確立期）
1927.url: https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/オプチカルプリンター
1927.note: Turned compositing into engineering, enabling modern VFX pipelines and the idea that cinematic reality can be constructed. #imaging #expressiontec
1927.note_en: Turned compositing into engineering, enabling modern VFX pipelines and the idea that cinematic reality can be constructed. #映像技術 #表現技術

1935.label: APワイヤーフォト開始
1935.note: Accelerated the shift from text-first to image-first news, a precursor to today’s social-media visual news dynamics. #journalism #mediatec
1935.note_en: Accelerated the shift from text-first to image-first news, a precursor to today’s social-media visual news dynamics. #ジャーナリズム #メディア技術

1945.label: 「As We May Think」（メメックス構想）
1945.note: A root idea for associative linking, anticipating hypertext, search, personal archives, and AI-assisted knowledge work. #mediatec #knowledge
1945.note_en: A root idea for associative linking, anticipating hypertext, search, personal archives, and AI-assisted knowledge work. #メディア技術 #知識流通

1948.label: ミュージック・コンクレート（鉄道のエチュード）
1948.label_en: Musique concrète (“Étude aux chemins de fer”)
1948.note: Made editing itself composition, anticipating today’s debates on authorship, material, and generative creation in music. #misictec #expressiontec #ai
1948.note_en: Made editing itself composition, anticipating today’s debates on authorship, material, and generative creation in music. #音楽技術 #表現技術 #AI

1950.label: アシモフ『われはロボット』
1950.note: The Three Laws popularized a narrative-driven ethics framework, shaping how society talks about AI governance. #expression #ai #ethics
1950.note_en: The Three Laws popularized a narrative-driven ethics framework, shaping how society talks about AI governance. #表現 #AI #倫理

1952.label: 『鉄腕アトム』（連載開始）
1952.note: Crucial in shaping Japan’s “robot as friend/citizen” imagination, showing narratives build tech worldviews alongside journalism. #expression #ai #japan
1952.note_en: Crucial in shaping Japan’s “robot as friend/citizen” imagination, showing narratives build tech worldviews alongside journalism. #表現 #AI #日本

1963.label: 『鉄腕アトム』（TVアニメ放送開始）
1963.note: An example of mass audiovisual media turning a tech imagination into shared generational language, useful for comparing how AI becomes everyday talk. #expression #media
1963.note_en: An example of mass audiovisual media turning a tech imagination into shared generational language, useful for comparing how AI becomes everyday talk. #表現 #メディア

1965.label: ハイパーテキストという語（テッド・ネルソン）
1965.note: When links become part of text, reading and writing change, foreshadowing today’s citation and provenance issues in AI-generated text. #mediatec #knowledge
1965.note_en: When links become part of text, reading and writing change, foreshadowing today’s citation and provenance issues in AI-generated text. #メディア技術 #知識流通

1968.label: 展覧会「Cybernetic Serendipity」
1968.url: https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/サイバネティック・セレンディピティ
1968.note: A landmark public framing of computers as creative tools, bridging tech history and art history for today’s AI-expression debates. #expressiontec #ai #art
1968.note_en: A landmark public framing of computers as creative tools, bridging tech history and art history for today’s AI-expression debates. #表現技術 #AI #アート

1969.label: ARPANET最初の通信（“LO”）
1969.note: Networks became both distribution channels and participatory spaces, enabling email, forums, social media, and today’s AI content circulation. #net #mediatec
1969.note_en: Networks became both distribution channels and participatory spaces, enabling email, forums, social media, and today’s AI content circulation. #インターネット #メディア技術

1971.label: 電子メールの発明（@の導入）
1971.note: Made person-to-person messaging a default medium, reshaping workflows and later enabling spam as the shadow side of convenience. #mediatec #journalism
1971.note_en: Made person-to-person messaging a default medium, reshaping workflows and later enabling spam as the shadow side of convenience. #メディア技術 #ジャーナリズム

1973.label: 映画『ウエストワールド』（デジタル画像処理の先駆）
1973.note: A practical early route to computational image processing in film, a useful “prehistory” for AI video. #imaging #ai
1973.note_en: A practical early route to computational image processing in film, a useful “prehistory” for AI video. #映像技術 #AI

1973.label: AARON（ハロルド・コーエンの生成的アート）
1973.note: A long-running exploration of rules, generation, and authorship, directly relevant to “where the author is” in generative AI. #art #ai #expressiontec
1973.note_en: A long-running exploration of rules, generation, and authorship, directly relevant to “where the author is” in generative AI. #アート #AI #表現技術

1976.label: Dykstraflex（デジタル制御モーションコントロール）
1976.url: https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/モーションコントロール撮影
1976.note: Turned camera movement into reproducible data, linking shooting and compositing via “blueprints,” a precursor to virtual production. #imaging #mediatec
1976.note_en: Turned camera movement into reproducible data, linking shooting and compositing via “blueprints,” a precursor to virtual production. #映像技術 #メディア技術

1978.label: 最初期のメールスパム（ARPANET広告）
1978.note: Shows that as delivery cost drops, unsolicited promotion floods in, a helpful analogy for AI-era content deluges. #trust #net
1978.note_en: Shows that as delivery cost drops, unsolicited promotion floods in, a helpful analogy for AI-era content deluges. #信頼 #インターネット

1979.label: Usenet（分散掲示板文化の始まり）
1979.note: A prototype for threads, moderation, and community dynamics, useful for thinking about AI-augmented discourse spaces. #net #community
1979.note_en: A prototype for threads, moderation, and community dynamics, useful for thinking about AI-augmented discourse spaces. #インターネット #コミュニティ

1983.label: MIDI 1.0（規格の合意）
1983.note: Standardized musical events across devices, accelerating software-based production and aligning well with generative workflows. #misictec #standard
1983.note_en: Standardized musical events across devices, accelerating software-based production and aligning well with generative workflows. #音楽技術 #標準化

1984.label: PostScript（ページ記述言語の登場）
1984.note: Made page layout programmable, transforming magazine and publishing workflows and pushing expression toward “code.” #mediatec #magazine
1984.note_en: Made page layout programmable, transforming magazine and publishing workflows and pushing expression toward “code.” #メディア技術 #雑誌

1984.label: Macintosh発売（GUIの大衆化）
1984.note: When interfaces change, creators multiply, a strong comparison point for generative AI UX and accessibility. #mediatec #expression
1984.note_en: When interfaces change, creators multiply, a strong comparison point for generative AI UX and accessibility. #メディア技術 #表現

1985.label: デスクトップパブリッシング革命（LaserWriter＋PageMaker）
1985.url: https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/デスクトップパブリッシング|https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/PageMaker
1985.note: Shrank and unified magazine production workflows, setting the stage for today’s AI-assisted editing, proofreading, and layout. #magazine #mediatec
1985.note_en: Shrank and unified magazine production workflows, setting the stage for today’s AI-assisted editing, proofreading, and layout. #雑誌 #メディア技術

1990.label: Adobe Photoshop 1.0
1990.note: Normalized image manipulation, slowly eroding “photo as evidence,” setting up the preconditions for deepfakes. #trust #imaging
1990.note_en: Normalized image manipulation, slowly eroding “photo as evidence,” setting up the preconditions for deepfakes. #信頼 #映像技術

1991.label: World Wide Web公開（CERN）
1991.note: A linked public space accelerated self-publishing and collective knowledge, later becoming a key training substrate for AI that now reshapes the web itself. #net #knowledge #ai
1991.note_en: A linked public space accelerated self-publishing and collective knowledge, later becoming a key training substrate for AI that now reshapes the web itself. #インターネット #知識流通 #AI

1993.label: CERNがWebをパブリックドメイン化
1993.label_en: CERN puts the Web in the public domain
1993.note: A classic case where openness drives adoption, a useful lens for AI standards and interoperability. #standard #net
1993.note_en: A classic case where openness drives adoption, a useful lens for AI standards and interoperability. #標準化 #インターネット

1999.label: RSS 0.91（ニュース配信の機械可読化）
1999.note: Automated update distribution enabled “build your own newspaper,” a key step toward AI summarization, recommendation, and automated editing. #journalism #net
1999.note_en: Automated update distribution enabled “build your own newspaper,” a key step toward AI summarization, recommendation, and automated editing. #ジャーナリズム #インターネット

2001.label: Wikipedia開始
2001.note: A social experiment in consensus editing that becomes central again as an AI training and reference substrate, raising renewed trust questions. #knowledge #trust #ai
2001.note_en: A social experiment in consensus editing that becomes central again as an AI training and reference substrate, raising renewed trust questions. #知識流通 #信頼 #AI

2001.label: Creative Commons設立
2001.url: https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/クリエイティブ・コモンズ
2001.note: Standardized licensing for the digital copy era, frequently referenced in debates over AI training, reuse, and attribution. #rights #standard
2001.note_en: Standardized licensing for the digital copy era, frequently referenced in debates over AI training, reuse, and attribution. #権利 #標準化

2005.label: YouTube開始（動画共有の大衆化）
2005.note: Shifted video from broadcaster-centric to platform-centric, foreshadowing how AI video scales once it becomes postable. #platform #video
2005.note_en: Shifted video from broadcaster-centric to platform-centric, foreshadowing how AI video scales once it becomes postable. #プラットフォーム #映像

2006.label: Twitter開始（短文と拡散）
2006.note: Implemented short-form virality at scale, shaping breaking news and propaganda dynamics and later bot and AI autopost issues. #journalism #trust
2006.note_en: Implemented short-form virality at scale, shaping breaking news and propaganda dynamics and later bot and AI autopost issues. #ジャーナリズム #信頼

2007.label: iPhone発売（モバイル表現と市民ジャーナリズム）
2007.note: Unified capture, creation, and distribution in a pocket device, opening the door to AI as an always-on “pocket editor.” #mobile #journalism
2007.note_en: Unified capture, creation, and distribution in a pocket device, opening the door to AI as an always-on “pocket editor.” #モバイル #ジャーナリズム

2014.label: GAN（敵対的生成ネットワーク）
2014.url: https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/敵対的生成ネットワーク
2014.note: A leap in generative modeling that made convincing synthetic media practical, simultaneously expanding expression and stressing trust. #ai #generative #trust
2014.note_en: A leap in generative modeling that made convincing synthetic media practical, simultaneously expanding expression and stressing trust. #AI #生成 #信頼

2017.label: Transformer（Attention Is All You Need）
2017.note: The foundation of large language models, transforming generation, summarization, and translation, and reshaping industries built on words. #ai #journalism
2017.note_en: The foundation of large language models, transforming generation, summarization, and translation, and reshaping industries built on words. #AI #ジャーナリズム

2017.label: 「ディープフェイク」語の成立
2017.note: When a name appears, society starts coordinating a response, forcing new verification norms for audiovisual evidence, elections, and reputation. #trust #video #ai
2017.note_en: When a name appears, society starts coordinating a response, forcing new verification norms for audiovisual evidence, elections, and reputation. #信頼 #映像 #AI

2019.label: StageCraft（LEDボリューム型バーチャルプロダクション）
2019.url: https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/バーチャルプロダクション
2019.note: Brought real-time CG back onto the set, making production itself a compositing environment, a natural receptacle for AI-assisted video workflows. #imaging #production
2019.note_en: Brought real-time CG back onto the set, making production itself a compositing environment, a natural receptacle for AI-assisted video workflows. #映像技術 #制作

2020.label: GPT-3論文
2020.note: Showed how fluent continuation can generalize into summarization, ideation, dialogue, and assistance, enabling practical AI co-editing in journalism and magazines. #ai #language #magazine
2020.note_en: Showed how fluent continuation can generalize into summarization, ideation, dialogue, and assistance, enabling practical AI co-editing in journalism and magazines. #AI #言語 #雑誌

2021.label: CLIP（画像と言語の結合）
2021.note: A key shift from fixed categories to natural-language grounding, enabling AI-powered search and creative exploration across image archives. #ai #saerch #expression
2021.note_en: A key shift from fixed categories to natural-language grounding, enabling AI-powered search and creative exploration across image archives. #AI #検索 #表現

2021.label: C2PA設立（来歴・改変の標準化）
2021.note: As manipulation becomes trivial, provenance metadata becomes critical, standardizing trust infrastructure for news, ads, and archives. #trust #standard #journalism
2021.note_en: As manipulation becomes trivial, provenance metadata becomes critical, standardizing trust infrastructure for news, ads, and archives. #信頼 #標準化 #ジャーナリズム

2022.label: Stable Diffusion公開
2022.note: Brought high-quality text-to-image generation to broad users, multiplying iteration speed and impacting editorial, advertising, and visual production. #generative #ai #expression
2022.note_en: Brought high-quality text-to-image generation to broad users, multiplying iteration speed and impacting editorial, advertising, and visual production. #生成 #AI #表現

2022.label: ChatGPT公開
2022.note: Mainstreamed conversational AI as a workflow tool, embedding itself into ideation, drafting, and research for editorial and journalism. #ai #journalism #magazine
2022.note_en: Mainstreamed conversational AI as a workflow tool, embedding itself into ideation, drafting, and research for editorial and journalism. #AI #ジャーナリズム #雑誌

2023.label: Content Credentials（透明性アイコンの普及加速）
2023.note: Concrete implementations of provenance labeling, turning transparency and accountability into practical policy and product questions. #trust #expression #standard
2023.note_en: Concrete implementations of provenance labeling, turning transparency and accountability into practical policy and product questions. #信頼 #表現 #標準化

2024.label: EU AI Act（包括的AI規制の採択）
2024.note: Codified transparency and risk frameworks for AI, influencing operational rules and disclosure norms that ripple into media practices. #ai #journalism
2024.note_en: Codified transparency and risk frameworks for AI, influencing operational rules and disclosure norms that ripple into media practices. #制度 #AI #ジャーナリズム

2024.label: OpenAI「Sora」発表（テキストから動画）
2024.note: Made text-to-video feel practical, amplifying both creative possibilities and misinformation risks, raising the stakes for verification in media. #generative #ai #video #trust
2024.note_en: Made text-to-video feel practical, amplifying both creative possibilities and misinformation risks, raising the stakes for verification in media. #生成 #AI #映像 #信頼

2025.label: Sora 2（動画生成の高精度化と音声統合）
2025.note: Improves controllability and integrates audio, pushing toward production-grade workflows and reorganizing roles across video and sound pipelines. #generative #ai #production
2025.note_en: Improves controllability and integrates audio, pushing toward production-grade workflows and reorganizing roles across video and sound pipelines. #生成 #AI #制作
